page_content: The page provides information on how to claim foreign tax credits and refunds on withholding taxes in the USA.
The page discusses traffic restrictions in Bern due to the 32nd Swiss Women's Run.
The page describes the tradition of manually ringing church bells in Frauenkappelen and the community's efforts to maintain it.
The page provides information on the official tax value of properties for the purpose of wealth taxation.
The page outlines the requirements and procedures for participating in qualification exams in the Canton of Bern.
